text: Bulat () is a rural locality (a village) in Bishkurayevsky Selsoviet, Tuymazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 266 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 41 km from Tuymazy, 4 km from Bishkurayevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tuymazinsky District
title: Bulat, Tuymazinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
